game.name: Digger: Galactic Treasures
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Digger: Galactic Treasures는 희귀 자원과 숨겨진 보물을 찾기 위해 소행성을 뚫는 우주 모험입니다. 은하계를 탐험하고 장비를 업그레이드하며 우주의 비밀을 밝혀보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Digger: Galactic Treasures is a space adventure where you drill into asteroids to uncover rare resources and hidden treasures. Explore the galaxy, upgrade your gear, and discover the secrets of the universe!

reviewHighlights.text: This game has a sense of humour. For example you start off your digging career with a spoon! It's a light hearted space mining game with a simple stor...
really cute and simple game, aprox. 7 hours to finish the main story and all achie. and 4 to collect all artifacts in the bonus level.
